Author: GitHub
Description:
The year of the agent ushered in vibe coding — asking an AI agent like GitHub Copilot to build and going with the flow. But too often we’re Icarus with a keyboard and flying too close to the sun. Agents can overwrite files, expose API keys, or hallucinate broken flows. In this GitHub Universe 2025 talk, Rizel will explain how the Model Context Protocol (MCP) adds structure and context, helping developers avoid these pitfalls. Using GitHub’s MCP server, she will demo safer prompt engineering, better AI observability, and how to keep the vibes high and the bugs low.

Speaker: Rizel Scarlett, Tech Lead of Open Source Developer Relations, Block (Speaker)

#GitHubCopilot #GitHubUniverse #GitHub
